statements: SELECT * FROM ImagingStudies WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT study_date, study_type FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_id, study_type FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_type = 'X-Ray';
SELECT * FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, study_date, study_type, study_result FROM ImagingStudies WHERE patient_id = 2 AND study_type = 'CT';
SELECT patient_id, study_date, study_type, study_result FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY study_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ImagingStudies WHERE patient_id = 1002 AND study_result LIKE '%abnormal%'
SELECT patient_id, study_type, COUNT(*) AS num_studies FROM ImagingStudies GROUP BY patient_id, study_type ORDER BY num_studies DESC
SELECT DISTINCT study_type FROM ImagingStudies ORDER BY study_type ASC
SELECT * FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT study_id, study_date, imaging_type FROM imaging_studies WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patient_history WHERE age > 50;
SELECT study_id, imaging_type, result FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_history WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT study_id, imaging_type FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patient_history WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies WHERE imaging_type LIKE '%MRI%' AND result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_history WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis FROM patient_records ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT study_id, patient_id, study_date FROM imaging_studies WHERE imaging_type = 'CT Scan';
SELECT * FROM disease_progression WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies
SELECT patient_id, study_date, imaging_type FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_id, evaluation_date, disease_stage, treatment FROM disease_progression ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, study_date, imaging_type, results FROM imaging_studies JOIN patient_records ON imaging_studies.patient_id = patient_records.patient_id
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies;
SELECT study_type, study_result FROM imaging_studies;
SELECT patient_id, study_date, study_type FROM imaging_studies ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_type = 'MRI';
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT study_type, COUNT(*) AS total_studies FROM imaging_studies GROUP BY study_type;
SELECT * FROM imaging_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, progression_notes FROM patients JOIN disease_progression ON patients.patient_id = disease_progression.patient_id WHERE progression_stage = 'Advanced';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT study_id, study_date, study_type, imaging_results FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_type='MRI';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ImagingStudies ORDER BY study_date DESC, study_type ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT study_id, study_type, imaging_results FROM ImagingStudies WHERE study_type='MRI' AND study_date='2022-09-15'

SELECT patient_name, study_type, progression_date FROM Patients JOIN ImagingStudies ON Patients.patient_id = ImagingStudies.patient_id JOIN DiseaseProgression ON Patients.patient_id = DiseaseProgression.patient_id

SELECT patient_name, study_type, progression_date FROM Patients JOIN ImagingStudies ON Patients.patient_id = ImagingStudies.patient_id JOIN DiseaseProgression ON Patients.patient_id = DiseaseProgression.patient_id ORDER BY progression_date DESC, study_date ASC
